lead_paragraph: After taking a three-week vacation from tennis after winning his sixth Australian Open title, Novak Djokovic is ready to get back on court Monday at the Dubai Tennis Championships.
snippet: After taking a three-week vacation from tennis after winning his sixth Australian Open title, Novak Djokovic is ready to get back on court Monday at the Dubai Tennis Championships....

headline.main: Djokovic Back From Vacation to Face Robredo in Dubai
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Back From Vacation to Face Robredo in Dubai
